title: avoid red arrows - type foundry of University of Arts and Design Karlsruhe
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013103400im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/avoidredarrows_6612.png)
 **[avoid red arrows](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013103400/http:/www.avoidredarrows.de/)** is the new type foundry of students at University of Arts and Design in Karlsruhe.

it is possible to use these fonts for your own projects if you contact the students kindly.

greetings from Karlsruhe

 [‹ TypeCon Web Fonts Panel - 100ft view](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013103400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47629 "Go to previous forum topic") [CT-Design "Emulation" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013103400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47904 "Go to next forum topic")
author: markomann

comments.content:
That’s cool! I actually did a type design course in Karlsruhe for a semester, taught by Reinhard Haus.

Who is teaching type design there now?

i’m sorry to say, that there is no prof to teach us type design.  
We got a course by Frank-Joachim Grossmann, but he is rather teaching the basics of typography than type design.  
Every now and then there’s a workshop or course to bait the students a bit.

cheers
Some really nice type in there!
The types are all very constructed and/or geometric. Can anyone at Karlsruhe make organic shapes?
